column1: echo ¦cd¦/tmp && echo "$PHANTOMJS_DOWNLOAD_SHA256 *phantomjs-2.0.0-source.zip" | sha256sum -c - && unzip phantomjs-2.0.0-source.zip && rm -f phantomjs-2.0.0-source.zip && cd phantomjs-* && ./build.sh --confirm && cp bin/phantomjs /usr/local/bin/... :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦cd¦/tmp && echo "$RUBY_DOWNLOAD_SHA256 *ruby-2.2.3.tar.gz" | sha256sum -c - && tar -xzf ruby-2.2.3.tar.gz && cd ruby-2.2.3 && ./configure && make && make install && cd .. && rm -rf ruby-2.2.3 && rm -f ruby-2.2.3.tar.gz :: Filesystem_operation
